app.name: GCMM
app.long_description:
A memory card manager for Wii/GC.
Updated to latest libraries by PabloACZ Batch gci backup by Pikachu025 Banner and Icon support by dronesplitter F-Zero and Phantasy Star Online support by Ralf
Thanks to original mcbackup example code, Askot, dsbomb and justb. Special thanks to Costis, Masken, Tantric and tueidj.
